ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Here i go again :-P
ygData.msgSnippet: You should also hold on to pixie dust. there are two quests for it. One for the rangers and one for the rogues. There is also a quest in the warrior guild
ygData.messageBody:
You should also hold on to pixie dust. there are two quests for it. One for
the rangers and one for the rogues.
There is also a quest in the warrior guild where you bring the guy a bat
fur, a bonechip, a spiderline eye, and a ruined wolf pelt. He gives you a
random item. sometimes armor or a gem that sells for a decent price. But you
have to have killed enough orcs to have good faction with him to do the
quest. Hail him and he will give you the quest. I wish I could remember his
name... he's in the place accross from the store that sells fletching stuff.
Pixies drop decent loot sometimes too. And there is the mail delivery quest
from Felwithe to Kelethin. Sometimes the guy you deliver mail to gives you
up to 5gp. I wish I could remember the name but my brain is just dead right
now.
luv,
-Su

> Thanks so much Su...it just so happens that Amaiya
> (now on Fennin) was lucky enough to get two hatchets
> in her travels this weekend...This is great news and i
> will do as you have suggested...i have been hanging
> around the lifts but have now made lvl 5 (all by
> myself..WOOT)and will have to move on soon i think..no
> more safety of knowing the guards there...lol...Gosh i
> never knew i could have so much fun alone...is alot
> easier because i am not frustrating the BF who has
> been playing the game for a long time and cannot
> understand why i sometimes just "don't get
> it"...pffffffff...my thanks to all of you here who
> have been such a HUGE help...Anyone on Fennin???? :-)
>
> **hugs**
> Amaiya, lvl 5 Wood Elf Druid, Loyal servant of Tunare
